title: Correlation vs Causation Quiz
subtitle: Can you tell the difference?
note: Note: Your confidence must be 50-100% since you're choosing one answer. If you were less than 50% confident, you'd choose the other option!
trueStatement: This is TRUE - there IS a causal relationship
falseStatement: This is FALSE - it's only correlation
totalEstimateQuestion: How many questions (out of {{total}}) do you think you got right?
dataSubmitted: Your data has been submitted successfully.
errorSubmitting: Error submitting data. Don't worry, your results are saved locally!
